Name: Poly Quest
About the game: A fantastic VR adventure awaits you with this low poly dungeon quest. Explore 6 environments and fight your way through angry skeletons, goblins, shamans, ghosts, golems and more. Solve puzzles, collect crystals and challenge your friends to get the best score. ArcadiaXR is providing this premium game free for all to enjoy.
